text: Va agar ʙuʙini ej Pajomʙar on hangomro, ki dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigorason istodaand onhoe, ki zinda gardonidani ʙa'd az mironidanro inkor karda ʙudand, gufta savad: «Ojo in haq nest?» Gujand: «Ore, savgand ʙa Parvardigoramon!» Gujad (Alloh ta'olo): «Ba saʙaʙi kufre, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulas dar dunjo mevarzided, azoʙro ʙicased!»
